name: learning-cucumber
description: (This file was first created using the Yeoman generator generator-hchiam-learning: https://www.npmjs.com/package/generator-hchiam-learning

scripts.reminder:
echo; echo -e 'Reminders: Did you do \033[1;34mnpm run my-build\033[0m first? 
Do you need to \033[1;34m[skip ci]\033[0m?'; echo;

author: hchiam

hooks.pre-commit: npm run reminder; if (npm run lint && npm test && npm run test:cucumber); then npm run reminder; else npm run reminder && exit 1; fi;
